summary: Completed testing of case-type specific custom fields functionality. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success). Case detail page successfully displays type-specific fields (main agent's ScrollArea fix worked!). However, Create Case dialog and Public Report form still have critical issues with conditional field rendering.

ui_bugs.issue: Case-type specific fields not appearing when case type is selected in Create Case dialog - conditional rendering not working despite backend support
ui_bugs.selector: text='Fly Tipping Details', text='Abandoned Vehicle Details'

ui_bugs.issue: Public Report page showing blank screen - form not loading properly, cannot test case-type specific fields

integration_issues.flow: Case type selection to conditional field rendering
integration_issues.issue: CaseTypeFields component not rendering in Create Case dialog when case type changes, but works correctly in case detail page

passed_tests: Backend login for all roles (manager, supervisor, officer)
Backend case creation with type-specific fields for all case types (Fly Tipping, Abandoned Vehicle, Littering, Dog Fouling, PSPO)
Backend case retrieval and update with type-specific fields
Backend public report submission with type-specific fields
Frontend login and navigation to Cases page
Frontend Cases page displaying cases correctly (22 cases found)
Frontend case detail page loading and navigation
Frontend case detail page displaying type-specific fields correctly (Littering Details section with proper fields)
Frontend Create Case dialog opening and case type dropdown functionality
Frontend case type selection in Create Case dialog (dropdown works)
Case detail Details tab showing case-type specific fields (MAJOR SUCCESS - ScrollArea fix worked!)
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix conditional rendering of CaseTypeFields component in Create Case dialog and Public Report form. The component works perfectly in case detail page (ScrollArea fix was successful!) but fails to render when case type is selected in forms. Also investigate Public Report page blank screen issue.
